TopicTitle: Hello you good people of the world! Carlpilot here!

Articles.Content:
Hello you good people of the world! This is Carlpilot, and I have been playing KSP since 0.13.2, back before persistence saves. The first thing I ever did was fly a rocket straight into the VAB, and since 0.25, I have been doing just that, to see how much will blow up the VAB and how much will not. One thing I still have trouble with, though, is manual transfers to other planets. I use the ksp.olex.biz calculator to get my phase angles, but I never quite can get an encounter.

Thanks,

Carlpilot
You have been playing longer than I have. Welcome to the forum at last.
